titleStmt.title: Observations upon a paper intituled, Reasons humbly offered to this honourable House why a Bill pretended to give further powers to the Corporation for setting the poor of the city of London and liberties thereof to work, should not pass into a law.

notesStmt.note: Docket title: Observations on the Reasons against the Bill for imploying the poor of London.
